installCommand: curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/flutter/bin && git config --global --add safe.directory $PWD/flutter && flutter config --enable-web
buildCommand: export PATH=$PATH:$PWD/flutter/bin && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
